definition: heard from time to time/one keeps hearing that...
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: I have often heard statements like these in my Toastmasters club.
sentences.chinese: 類似這樣的言論，在我的演講會中時有所聞。

sentences.english: Although an agreement has been reached, rumbles of resentment can still be heard.
sentences.chinese: 儘管已經達成了協議，但不滿的抱怨聲仍時有所聞。
